languages.text: {n}Бросив беглый взгляд на вид-скрин, Паскаль глухо роняет:{/n} "Свидетельствую о скорой гибели данной пустотной станции. Повреждения внутренней инфраструктуры достигли критического объема, после которого разрушение принимает каскадный характер".

{n}Pasqal casts a brief glance at the vid-screen and speaks dryly:{/n} "The imminent demise of this void station is affirmed. The damage to its core infrastructure has reached critical mass, at which point further degradation has commenced in a cascading configuration."
languages.original_text: {n}Бросив беглый взгляд на вид-скрин, Паскаль глухо роняет:{/n} "Свидетельствую о скорой гибели данной пустотной станции. Повреждения внутренней инфраструктуры достигли критического объема, после которого разрушение принимает каскадный характер".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqual casts a brief glance at the vid-screen and speaks dryly:{/n} "I attest to the imminent demise of this voidstation. The damage to its core infrastructure has reached a critical level, at which point the destruction takes on a cascading nature."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal observa brevemente la videopantalla y habla de forma inexpresiva:{/n} «Se confirma la inminente destrucción de esta estación del vacío. La infraestructura central ha sufrido daños críticos, lo que ha dado lugar a un deterioro progresivo».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a brief glance at the vid-screen and speaks dryly:{/n} "The imminent demise of this void station is affirmed. The damage to its core infrastructure has reached critical mass, at which point further degradation has commenced in a cascading configuration."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal observa brevemente la videopantalla y habla de forma inexpresiva:{/n} «Se confirma la inminente destrucción de esta estación del vacío. La infraestructura central ha sufrido daños críticos, lo que ha dado lugar a un deterioro progresivo».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal wirft einen kurzen Blick auf den Vid-Bildschirm und sagt dann trocken:{/n} "Es ist bestätigt, der Untergang dieser Station steht unmittelbar bevor. Der Schaden an der Kerninfrastruktur hat eine kritische Masse erreicht, und ab diesem Punkt hat jede weitere Verschlechterung zu einer kaskadierenden Konfiguration geführt."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a brief glance at the vid-screen and speaks dryly:{/n} "The imminent demise of this void station is affirmed. The damage to its core infrastructure has reached critical mass, at which point further degradation has commenced in a cascading configuration."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal wirft einen kurzen Blick auf den Vid-Bildschirm und sagt dann trocken:{/n} "Es ist bestätigt, der Untergang dieser Station steht unmittelbar bevor. Der Schaden an der Kerninfrastruktur hat eine kritische Masse erreicht, und ab diesem Punkt hat jede weitere Verschlechterung zu einer kaskadierenden Konfiguration geführt."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal lance un rapide coup d'œil à l'écran, avant d'annoncer sèchement :{/n} « La fin imminente de cette station spatiale ne fait plus aucun doute. Les dégâts subis par son infrastructure centrale ont atteint un niveau critique, ce qui a entraîné une dégradation en cascade. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a brief glance at the vid-screen and speaks dryly:{/n} "The imminent demise of this void station is affirmed. The damage to its core infrastructure has reached critical mass, at which point further degradation has commenced in a cascading configuration."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal lance un rapide coup d'œil à l'écran, avant d'annoncer sèchement :{/n} « La fin imminente de cette station spatiale ne fait plus aucun doute. Les dégâts subis par son infrastructure centrale ont atteint un niveau critique, ce qui a entraîné une dégradation en cascade. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡看了一眼视讯屏幕，冷淡地开了口。{/n}“这座星站即将消亡的事实已经得到证实。核心基础设施的损坏已到达临界值，各系统的状况已经开始以级联方式进一步恶化。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a brief glance at the vid-screen and speaks dryly:{/n} "The imminent demise of this void station is affirmed. The damage to its core infrastructure has reached critical mass, at which point further degradation has commenced in a cascading configuration."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡看了一眼视讯屏幕，冷淡地开了口。{/n}“这座星站即将消亡的事实已经得到证实。核心基础设施的损坏已到达临界值，各系统的状况已经开始以级联方式进一步恶化。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルはスクリーンをチラリと見て、辛辣に言葉を吐く。{/n}「このヴォイドステーションが近く終わりを迎えるのは確定だな。コアインフラの被害は限界値に達していて、そこからそれ以上の崩壊がドミノ倒しで始まっている」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a brief glance at the vid-screen and speaks dryly:{/n} "The imminent demise of this void station is affirmed. The damage to its core infrastructure has reached critical mass, at which point further degradation has commenced in a cascading configuration."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, video ekranına kısa bir bakış attıktan sonra soğuk soğuk konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu uçsuz istasyonunun çöküşünün yakın olduğu kesin. Temel altyapısındaki hasar, kritik seviyeye ulaşmış. Bu noktadan itibaren de kademeli olarak ileri bozulmalar başlamış."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal casts a brief glance at the vid-screen and speaks dryly:{/n} "The imminent demise of this void station is affirmed. The damage to its core infrastructure has reached critical mass, at which point further degradation has commenced in a cascading configuration."
